content.body: I've got another newbie question: https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-slice indicates that the result of `blob.slice` with no `contentType` should have the content type set to `""`. 1) Am I reading this right? 2) A simple wpt test indicates that no browser does this, so is this worth a wpt test or spec issue?
content.formatted_body: I've got another newbie question: https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-slice indicates that the result of blob.slice with no contentType should have the content type set to "". 1) Am I reading this right? 2) A simple wpt test indicates that no browser does this, so is this worth a wpt test or spec issue?

I've got another newbie question: https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-slice indicates that the result of blob.slice with no contentType should have the content type set to "". 1) Am I reading this right? 2) A simple wpt test indicates that no browser does this, so is this worth a wpt test or spec issue?

content.body:
> <@dlrobertson:matrix.org> I've got another newbie question: https://w3c.github.io/FileAPI/#dfn-slice indicates that the result of `blob.slice` with no `contentType` should have the content type set to `""`. 1) Am I reading this right? 2) A simple wpt test indicates that no browser does this, so is this worth a wpt test or spec issue?

That's my reading as well. Worth a spec issue.
